attributes.action: Nominate Lemmy from Motorhead for a knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lemmy, a bastion of British Metal, thoroughly deserves to be knighted.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Nominate Lemmy from Motorhead for a knighthood."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14958.asp

Prime Minister's Office
